pr_title: Parquet: Use new logical type annotations

timeline.bodyText: In Parquet, LogicalTypeAnnotation.java, there is LogicalTypeAnnotation.IntLogicalTypeAnnotation. Do we need it here too?
timeline.author: wangmiao1981

replies.bodyText: Methods that aren't implemented here use the superclass implementation, which returns Optional.empty. When that happens, we fall back to the old logic that uses just the primitive type.
replies.author: rdblue

timeline.bodyText: When writer.isPresent() == false, we falls back to the previous logic, right?
timeline.author: waterlx

timeline.message: Parquet: Use new logical type annotations.
Remove originalType switch when using logical type visitor.
Remove originalType switch when using logical type visitor.
